title: ABC7 Salutes first responders and the chefs feeding them
body: ABC7 Salutes first responders and some chefs helping feed those heroes.Hundreds of meals were delivered to every firehouse in DC for frontline workers Friday.Cookology, an Arlington-based cooking school, and four local restaurants partnered with the city's Food on the Stove nonprofit to make sure first responders have a hearty healthy meal.The meal delivery not only helped feed first responders, it also helped get restaurant employees back to work amid the pandemic.
